overview: Many young women have issues with their mothers, but Chloe Kinross has gone into mom-hating over-drive, blaming only her for dad's exit from the family. But despite her kindly father's advice that they just simply drifted apart, both pursuing their own professions in the therapeutic industry, and it's best to let sleeping dogs lie. Chloe won't have any of it, and wants to wake that vicious canine up. Sara Luvv leads the cast is her most mesmerizing erotic performance to date. Also starring India Summer as the mother, and James Deen as the groom to be. Also featuring Logan Pierce, Steven St. Croix and Tomi Taylor.
title: Mother Daughter Affair 2
